original_title: To keno: I mousiki periptosi tis Katerinas Petrakou
overview: The film presents the singer and composer Katerina Petrakou and her sole piece of work To keno (The Void). Twenty years later, this unique artist talks about her music and how she approaches the meaning of art as well as the "art" of life
title: The Void: The Musical Case of Katerina Petrakou
